DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effect oral Diosmin oral Cabergoline prevention ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome ( OHSS ) high-risk woman underwent intracytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI ) .
DOC.brief_title: Diosmin Versus Cabergoline Prevention Ovarian Hyperstimulation Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: Two hundred woman risk ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome ICSI cycle randomly schedule two equal group . In group A , ( Diosmin group ) , 2 tab / 8 h Diosmin ( 500mg ) give day HCG injection 2 week ; group B ( Cabergoline group ) , 1 tab/day Cabergoline ( 0.5 mg ) give day HCG injection eight day .
DOC.criteria: infertile woman undergo intracytoplasmic sperm injection polycystic ovarin syndrome ( PCO ) one following : 1 . Presence 20 follicle ultrasound 2 . E2 3000 pg/ml 3 . Retrieval 15 follicle
